session.goal: MAPLE Life OS Learning Layer Wave 1 Agent A — Type Extensions and RxDB Collection Setup

changes.summary: Extended type system and database schema for Learning Layer MVP. Added SignalWeight collection, new pattern types, learned_suggestion signal type, and supporting fields to enable feedback-based signal prioritization.
decisions_made: Added 'learned_suggestion' as 15th SignalType for AI-generated suggestions based on learned patterns
Extended PatternType with 3 new values: task_estimation, cadence, domain_balance
Created SignalWeight interface to track effectiveness metrics per signal_type/domain pair
Added signalWeights field to AnticipationContext for runtime access to effectiveness data
Added learned_suggestions field to MorningBrief for displaying AI suggestions
Created signal_weights RxDB collection with composite index on [signal_type, domain]
Added signal_weights to replication tables array for Supabase sync

next_immediate_step.action: Wave 1 Agent A complete — ready for Agent B (Signal Weight Tracker)
next_immediate_step.details: Types and DB schema ready. Next: implement SignalWeightTracker service to populate signal_weights collection based on user interactions (dismiss, act on, ignore signals).

next_three_steps: Wave 1 Agent B: Build SignalWeightTracker service with track(), calculateEffectiveness(), updateWeights() methods
Wave 1 Agent C: Build LearningEngine service to read signal_weights and generate learned_suggestion signals
Wave 1 Agent D: Integrate learning engine into morning brief generation pipeline
